name: Shanahan Strategy Inc.
description:
We help manufacturers and industrial companies build online marketing and sales strategies that attract the right leads and drive more revenue. Companies turn to Shanahan when they are:
Frustrated with stagnant revenue growth
Concerned about poor lead generation
Seeking to modernize their marketing strategy
Tired of skyrocketing marketing budgets with poor results
Embarrassed by weak brand awareness
Unsure how to reach today’s buyers with digital marketing
Looking for a proven marketing partner
Shanahan Strategy provides innovative marketing strategy and sales consulting for small to mid-sized industrial and manufacturing businesses. All our services are focused on one goal, increased sales, and revenue growth.
Services include marketing strategy, buyer persona research, competitive analysis, content marketing strategy, website design, website development, lead generation, demand generation, marketing automation, lead nurturing, social media marketing, PPC advertising, marketing analytics.
